pageContext.claim: “So that's something that we should talk about. I was honored to see that the stock market -- you were mostly there with us -- set a record in a short period of time -- over a 45-minute period that we had the press conference yesterday in the Rose Garden. That was a record. All-time record.”
pageContext.analysis: The stock market had the biggest jump in 11 years following Trump’s Rose Garden news conference, but it was still significantly down from where it had been at the beginning of the week.
